paragraph1: This list is a record of general advice provided by the Planning Inspectorate. We publish this to comply with the 2008 Planning Act.
paragraph2: Project specific advice can be viewed on the relevant project page.
searchInstruction: Search by key words or the name of person the advice was given to.
noResultsParagraph1: No advice was found matching your search term.
noResultsParagraph2: Would you like to clear your search to view all available advice instead?
